plot: Set in medieval Scandinavia. Berserker is the story of a Viking boy with aspirations to become a fishing boat captain who is thrust down the path to become a Berserker, the most feared of Viking warriors.
title: Berserker
plot_es: Set in medieval Scandinavia. Berserker is the story of a Viking boy with aspirations to become a fishing boat captain who is thrust down the path to become a Berserker, the most feared of Viking warriors.
plot_en: Set in medieval Scandinavia. Berserker is the story of a Viking boy with aspirations to become a fishing boat captain who is thrust down the path to become a Berserker, the most feared of Viking warriors.
